Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ]

Price: $180.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:56 UTC – Details)


The Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGF575S, with DECT 6.0 and Link2 Cell technology, answering system, dual keypad and 5 cordless phones handsets, allows you to link up to two cell or smart phones and integrate them into the telephone system via Bluetooth, no landline phone line required. All of your contacts stored into your cell or smart phone can be shared with this phone system allowing you access to important contacts right from the handset. Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up with text-to-speech announcements in English and Spanish from the base unit and cordless handsets in the home/home office. The Panasonic home phone with answering machine also features easy call block, speakerphone, voice paging, power back up operation and advanced TAD (telephone answering device) functions tie it all together making this system one of the most reliable and functional systems available in the market today. Do not overload power outlets and extension cords. This can result in the risk of fire or electric shock.
Expandable Panasonic Cordless Phone with Answering Machine: 5-handset home phone system with added features to keep you connected; Digital Answering Machine stores 18-min of messages
Interference-Free, Secure Phone Signal: DECT 6.0 wireless technology for whole home coverage and less interference from other electronics; ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls
Bluetooth Phone Connects to Cell and Voice Assistants: Make and receive calls from your cellular device with Link2Cell pairing up to 2 cell phones; connect handsets to Siri, Google Now and S Voice through Voice Assist feature
Bi-Lingual Talking Caller ID and Smart Call Blocker: Talking caller ID announces caller information in English or Spanish; block unwanted calls with the push of a button on telephone handset or main base unit
More Features to Enjoy: Handset to handset intercom and baby monitor function, battery back-up for up to 12-hr talk time when the power goes out, 3000-entry phone book, and more

Advanced Calling Made Easy

Improved five-handset system syncs two smartphones, connects to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice, blocks unwanted callers, includes Talking Caller ID, and a headset jack. Expandable up to six handsets.

Read more

Sync Two Smartphones

The simple push of a button links up to two smartphones to make and receive cell calls routed through your Link2Cell handsets. Advanced Class 1 Bluetooth extends calling range to 330 ft. to easily handle calling from both cell lines simultaneously.

Connect to Siri, Google Now and S Voice

When synced to your smartphone via Link2Cell, you can connect to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice anytime from your handsets with the Voice Assist feature. Simply press ‘Assist’ on the handset or base unit to send voice commands for making phone calls, checking new messages, weather and more, and hear the responses on the handset.

Block Bothersome Callers

With a dedicated Call Block button on each handset, it’s easy to block telemarketers, robocallers, and other unwanted caller numbers. One button registers up to 250 caller numbers — even while the phone is ringing or while you’re talking or listening.

Talking Caller ID

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re on the other, Panasonic’s advanced Talking Caller ID in English and Spanish and Text ID tell you who’s calling with text-to-speech announcements from speakers in the base unit and handsets.

Read more

Beyond Intercom

Wake kids for school in the morning and let everyone know when dinner is ready in the evening with Panasonic ‘s exclusive Voice Paging. More than a traditional intercom, VP makes it easy to send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house, even when family members don’t respond.

Power When the Power Goes Out with Low Battery Alert

Included rechargeable backup batteries keep you connected when the power goes out. With a fully charged handset in the base unit, you’ll have power for up to 12 hours talk time and 7 days standby for calls using other cordless handsets in the house.

Now, when any of your handsets are running low on power, the handsets alert you. And as an added convenience, a large, highly-visible battery status icon on the handset LCD lets you know as well.

Hear Calls from Noisy Places

Whether someone’s calling from a busy city street or a raucous room, Noise Reduction automatically suppresses background interference while also enhancing voice tones for clearer, more comfortable conversations.

Large Backlit Display

A large 1.8-inch high-contrast white backlit LCD and enlarged, easier to see and use dial keys and function control buttons make home and home office call management quicker and more convenient for everyone.

Read more

Additional Calling Conveniences

With the Panasonic KX-TGF575S system, you can program and store up to 3,000 numbers in your phonebook, and enjoy the time-saving convenience of nine speed dial settings and handset-to-handset intercom.

App Alert (for Android) :

Download the Panasonic Link2Cell app to stay informed and up to date via your smartphone, tablet and Link2Cell system. Receive SMS, email, calendar, low battery notice, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram notifications on your Link2Cell base unit and LCD handsets.

Accessories :

The KX-TGF575S base unit is wall-mountable and comes with matching wall bracket and screws. Two rechargeable AAA-size Ni-MH batteries plus a belt clip are also included.

What’s in the Box :

  • KX-TGF575S phone system base unit
  • 5 Cordless handsets
  • 4 Chargers
  • 5 Belt clips
  • Wall mount
  • 10 Rechargeable Ni-MH AAA-size batteries

Read more

Welcome to CDE Jewelry
　
♬About CDE:
☞Professional design team & model from Paris
☞Enrolled in Amazon brand registry
☞Stellar Service
　
CDE COMMITS HERSELF TO COLORING YOUR LIFE WITH LOVE
Inspired by nature, civilizations and all the beautiful things in life, CDE Jewelry is designed for the ladies who are dynamic, brave, confident, wise and unique!
Every piece of CDE jewelry was made with exquisite craftsmanship. The detail speaks for itself.
　
♬Austrian Crystals:
CDE purchased genuine Austrian Crystals as raw material and skillfully applied on our own products. This jewelry belongs to CDE.
　
♬Best Choice for Her on:
☞Birthday
☞Mother’s Day
☞Christmas Day
☞Wedding
☞Engagement
☞Anniversary
☞Valentine’s Day
　
♬Care Tips for Your Crystals Jewelry
☞Store your CDE jewelry separately to avoid the scratch.
☞Keep away from chemicals, sweat, bath, crash to avoid any damage.
☞Rub your CDE Jewelry with baby wipes to bring back the shine.


Jewelry itself has no value, but the jewels which can make women shining are priceless! 

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 3, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ CDE
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B085DDMN7Z

MOTHER’S DAY CHRISTMAS GIFTS FOR WOMEN Comes in a CDE mom jewelry gift box. No wrapping needed. Perfect for gift giving
DESIGN Dark Red heart Crystal wrapped in the angel wing base on which there are many small zircons inlaid. Through such a combination of crystals and zircons, The whole necklace presents the shape of the angel heart.
MATERIALSWhite Gold Plated. Hypoallergenic, Lead-Free, Nickel-Free, passed Swiss SGS Inspection Standard, no harm to health. A+ Stones all appear to be securely set. Embellished with Austrian Crystals are inlaid into the metal by hand, This women gifts for Mothers Day will stay sturdy and not be fell off easily.
SPECIFICATIONS Pendant: 1.45 inch(L)/1.61 inch(H)/0.27 inch(W); Adjustable Chain:16+2 inch; Weight: 0.42 ounces
MATCHING The combination of heart shape crystals add an irresistible sparkle to your daily look. It is a perfect match to evening gown, cocktail dress, wedding dress or blouse and jeans

CDE has its own factory with over 10 years professional experience and lots of jewelry technology patents.

CDE’s vision is bringing the high-quality products and services that exceed our customers' desires.

Each item is a precious artwork！

MAINTENANCE INSTRUCTION

Keep your jewelry in your CDE box at the end of the day.

Do not spray perfume directly on the jewelry

Do not immerse your jewelry in liquid.

After wearing the necklace, wipe it with a soft flannel cloth before putting them away.

Minor tarnish can be lightly buffed off with a jewelry polishing cloth(you can find the cloth in the gift box) or a mild jewelry cleaner.

Details

Mermaid color Heart-shaped stunning and shining crystal wrapped in the Platinum Plated angel wing, glitters and sparkles. The dazzling necklace represents the symbol FOREVER LOVE and the faith of Guardian. Go get wearing it and enjoy the stunning sparkle and all the compliments

Lobster Clasp

Necklace is SEPARATED with the chain so that you could make a change if you'd like to update the collocation and it is adjustable with a chain 17.71 in+1.97 in. No worry about the necklace would not fit

Gift Box

This Angel Wings necklace comes in an elegant jewelry gift box, Great gifts for daughter, gifts for women, gifts for mom, gifts for wife, gifts for aunt, gifts for best friend, etc. Ideal Birthday Gifts, Anniversary Gifts,Christmas Gifts,Thanksgiving gifts, Graduation Gifts, Mother's Day Gifts, Valentine's Day Gifts, etc, or just as a surprise to remind that special one how much you care!

Crystals from Austrian Crystals

These glittering crystals shimmer with the slightest movement and sparkle even in the lowest light settings.

Shining Jewelry Brighten Up Your Brilliant Life

A Romantic and Gorgeous Loving Gift , Keeping those we love close to us, and sharing this good energy and love with others.

MATERIAL: S925 Sterling Sliver Post, letter earrings is 14K gold plated and pave with AAA+ cubic zirconia. Our initial stud earrings are nickel and lead free, hypoallergenic,anti-rust.
CLASSIC DESIGN: Simple Heart Initial Design ,sparkle and elegant. Lightweight, comfortable for sensitive ears, initial studs earrings are perfect for every day and night wear.
PERFECT GIFTS: Heart earrings give you a comfortable wearing experience. Special gifts for your lover, girlfriend, wife, fiancee, daughter, female friends or just yourself. Perfect gifts for Mother’s day gifts, Valentines day gifts, birthday gifts..
AFTER SALES SERVICE: Protected by 90-day money back and free exchange if you’re not satisfied with gold initial stud earrings purchased.

Previous page

  1. We always consider product safety to be of the utmost importance

  2. Direct selling by our own factory

  3. Simple designs paired with shiny cubic zirconia make you look less flashy yet regal, easy to match

  4. Thank every customer for their support and trust in Anoup, we will strive to do better

Next page

1 Safe & Hypoallergenic 2 Lower Costs 3 Simple & Cute 4 Good Reviews


Three colors are available

Previous page
Next page

  1. Pretty and cute hearts are little girls’ favorites, and we made earrings in their shapes to make the girls who wear them happy and beautiful.
  2. The design of the letters gives the earrings a connection with the girls who wear them, and their relationship becomes closer.

  1. Heart initial earrings for teen girls are tiny but outstanding, perfect for everyday to combine with other earrings or wear it alone.
  2. Heart stud earrings has become a trend that leads fashion.
  3. Heart jewelry is not only attractive but also full of youthful atmosphere.

Earrings for Kids Toddler

Babies and toddlers have very sensitive ears, The post of our earrings are made of S925 sterling silver, free of lead and nickel. Safe to daily wear.

Good Choice for Women & Girls

This stud is suitable for all women to wear, simple design, safe material, lovely shape, beautiful color, it deserves to be loved by all women.

Simple Heart Design

A perfect size tiny heart initial earrings, perfect for girls, kids, toddler, baby girl wear.

Come with A Gift Box

Whether its a birthday, holiday, a special occasion, or just because, heart stud earrings is always the perfect gift.

My little girl’s ears are allergic. Can she wear this stud？

Yes, she can. The post is made of sterling silver, is hypoallergenic and won’t harm her ears.

Are these little girl stud earrings? Can adults wear it?

Of course you can, and it’s even better for you. In order to make it safe for little girls to use, so it’s safe. Simple design with love makes this stud suitable for most people.

I don’t like the backs in the picture. Is there any other choice?

Oh, of course, we will include three different pairs of additional backs in the package, so you can choose whichever pair you like.

I can’t find the letters I was looking for, why?

Our products contain all the letters and are available in three different colors, if some of the letters are not on the list, it is because it is out of stock, we will make up for it as soon as possible, you can come back to Anoup after a while.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Windows 10 operating system Windows 10 brings back the Start Menu from Windows 7 and introduces new features, like the Edge Web browser that lets you markup Web pages on your screen. 15.6″ Micro-edge touchscreen display With virtually no bezel encircling the display, an ultra-wide viewing experience provides for seamless multi-monitor set-ups. 10th Generation Intel Core i5-1035G1 processor Smart dual-core, four-way processing performance. Intel Turbo Boost Technology delivers dynamic extra power when you need it, while increasing energy efficiency when you don’t. 12GB system memory for full-power multitasking Plenty of high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run your games and photo- and video-editing applications, as well as multiple programs and browser tabs all at once. 256GB Solid State Drive Save files fast and store more data. With massive amounts of storage and advanced communication power, PCI-e SSDs are great for major gaming applications, multiple servers, daily backups, and more.
